===Damaged News Clip===
The Damaged News Clip is located on the counter above deck, next to Pitot.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Damaged News Clip:''' (A shabby local page from [[The Steambird]], clipped out and discarded here)
:'''Damaged News Clip:''' "...imports of [[Chenyu Vale]] tea are forecast to fall in the next quarter... same time that the market price of [[Liyue]] tea and other products rises to... [[Mora]]..."
:'''Damaged News Clip:''' (Several lines of text are circled in the bottom-right corner of the clipping, accompanied by an asterisk and three large exclamation marks.)
:{{DIcon}} (See the circled content.)
::'''Damaged News Clip:''' "...Recently, all senior executives in the Club di Pantaloni Novita criminal organization have been arrested. The underground balance of power in Lumidouce Harbor is feared broken by the [[Spina di Rosula]]..."
:;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} (See content marked with an asterisk)
::'''Damaged News Clip:''' "...Lumidouce Harbor aquabus project shelved again! Workers stranded in the harbor, treatment unknown..."
:;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} (Nothing to see here.)
::'''Damaged News Clip:''' (You drop the clipping.)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Tattered Paper===
The Tattered Paper can be found on a box at the base of the ramp facing the sea.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Tattered Paper:''' "...wanna join... Pinky Club... Tell Choneaux to pass the message that our books are open for him."
:'''Tattered Paper:''' "...pass on to Choudy: 'The oak wine barrels have worm damage, and the new batch of Corte wine is too acidic'... Ask him to bring his equipment and sort out the pests pronto..."
{{Dialogue End}}

===Crumpled Bill===
The Crumpled Bill can be found on a box outside the door leading below deck.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Crumpled Bill:''' (A crumpled bill, with a few lines scribbled on the back.)
:'''Crumpled Bill:''' "...the bag guy brought the news: the people of Liyue want to eat alone, and His Honor is not pleased... Someone has to make them wear stiff shoes..."<ref group="Note">"To eat alone" is a literal translation of the Chinese idiom [https://baike.baidu.com/item/吃独食/1009864 {{zh|吃独食|tl=to monopolize the rewards.}}]</ref>
:'''Crumpled Bill:''' "...the boss intends to set out at sundown, summon that good guy Walker, and bring even more soldiers..."
{{Dialogue End}}

===Discarded Bill===
The Discarded Bill can be found on the countertop next to "Tilla," located below deck.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Discarded Bill:''' (A bill, carelessly discarded on the bar, one corner marked with scrawled corrections.)
:'''Discarded Bill:''' "...three shipments from Liyue... very heavy... Brek's checked them..."
:'''Discarded Bill:''' "...our Liyue friends have one foot on the bridge, and they could use some help..."
{{Dialogue End}}

The "three shipments" may be referencing the {{Quest|Big Business}}. In it, [[Pantalone]]'s subordinate [[Landa]] lost three boxes of invoices for a "real huge business venture," leading the [[Traveler]] to help retrieve them.
